extendedInfo.description: A time travel in Art with a huge collection of 60 000 artworks from 500 great artists, at your fingertips ! Thousands just from from Monet, Van Gogh, Renoir ... at your fingertips !ErgsArt is an innovative virtual art museum & art gallery, a huge collection of artworks for artists and art-lovers to discover thousands of famous masterpieces at a glance !Awesome views, high resolution artworks, paintings, sculptures, drawings from multiple artists with smart features such as search with multiple queries, suggestions for a given artwork and several related informations. All data are available offline once retrieved, no need data connection to apreciate these artworks !ErgsArt is also social with live comments and discussions about a given work, directly in the app ! (you can opt out in settings).We provide features to discover easily more stunning artworks with real time views and popular paintings !You can share pictures with your friends or social-network by photo-sharing services or email, bookmark them for your curated selection or apply fantastic filters on your favorite masterpieces directly from ErgsArt.A unique experience.Our users say:â¥ "Great! For art's lovers!" (Massim*)â¥ "Love It" (Norber*)â¥ "Nice. Looks good. Many art and info." (user)â¥ "Unexpected bonus art history app. [...] Surprising depth for a free app." (Graf*)â¥ "Love the wide and vast array of art you can view in this app. I can also put them in my kindle's picture gallery and look at them anytime without wifi." (Mills*)â¥ "Great! For art's lovers!" (Massi*)â¥ "The collection of art is huge and it all looks great." (Zach*)â¥ "Nice Looks good. Many art and info." (User)Discover in details amazing masterpieces such as the Joconde (Mona Lisa) by Leonardo Da Vinci or the Raft of the Medusa by Gericault or the statue of David by Michelangelo. The application covers greatest art movements like the renaissance with Vinci, Durer, baroque with Vermeer or impressionism with artists like Monet or Manet ...etcSome features:--------ââMUSEUMâ  Huge collection of 60 000 artworks, thousands just from greatest artists !â  Paintings, sculptures, drawings, sketches from 500 great masters !â  Several art movements like impressionism, baroque, realism or romanticism and renaissanceâ  Galleries, details (like parts of the masterpiece statue of David by Michelangelo)â  Explore hundreds at a glanceENTERTAINMENTâ  Timeline feature : a time travel in Art ! Browse huge artworks collection by their date of creation !â  Slideshow feature, easily swipe between artworks : from gallery, artwork detail and Game tabsâ  Apply amazing filters, frames, colors, transformations, layers on any artworks to experience changes with effectsâ  Bookmark, set any image as wallpaperSEARCH & DISCOVERYâ  Search by title, artist name, location, media types, date, location, compose your gallery !â  Voice recognition (long click on search) : use keyword for search or commands, e.g. flowers 18, woman portrait 16, michelangelo or launching actions with commands like 'refresh' - 'load more data' - 'slide show'â  Statistics: see popular artworks for discoverySOCIALâ  Share with multiple attachment via email / social appsâ  Social integration: comment/discuss directly in ErgsArt and share your discoveries with your friends or other art-lovers !OFFLINEâ  Retrieve offline data : each downloaded artwork is available offline; you can also fetch artworks for offline use from a selected gallery or download archives of all available artworksFUN & GAMEâ  Play with art: find artworks of a given artist among others, addicting !Have a great time travel with ErgsArt !

reviews.title: Keel working
reviews.comment: Thumbnail sometimes broken and full view works unreliably. Close to being an amazing app.
reviews.author: Josh Laughlin

reviews.title: Thx
reviews.comment: It is fine now. The app opens perfectly fine. The collection of art is huge and it all looks great.
reviews.author: Zach McCarty

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Looks good. Many art and info.
reviews.author: A Google User
